name: Assimilate (Myr-Myr)
description:
Submission for the Autistica Game Jam 2020, under the theme of "Communication".

A very short game in which you must go about your life in an alien society, managing your anxiety and energy levels whilst avoiding suspicion.

Music licenses used:

Follow That Dream by Luca Fraula

License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
